medical_history.chief_complaint: Elevated LFTs and monitoring following ERCP and EUS with FNA in setting of pancreatic head mass.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient experienced improvement in symptoms since discharge, noting reduced morning fogginess and arthralgias, with increased energy. However, she reports ongoing limited appetite, early satiety, and intermittent epigastric heaviness. Abdominal discomfort has been present, wrapping to bilateral flanks. She has not had a bowel movement since a colonoscopy performed recently.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had an episode of jaundice at an unspecified age, was diagnosed with colon cancer at age 58, and died 6 months later. Grandmother died from septicemia due to abdominal causes. Sister has an unspecified disease.
